.. _api-reference:

API Reference
=============

This section provides comprehensive documentation for all public functions in the AstroDynX library.
The API is organized into logical modules for different aspects of astrodynamics computations.

   :maxdepth: 2

   astrodynx
   astrodynx.prop
   astrodynx.twobody
   astrodynx.gravity
   astrodynx.events
   astrodynx.utils
